params.modId: The module ID of the plugin

setPluginId(uint256).details: Only callable by the plugin registry contract

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract with the provided DAO and module ID

deployer().notice: Returns the address of the deployer of the plugin

novaAddress().notice: Returns the address of the Nova the plugin is associated with

owner().notice: Returns the owner of the plugin

pluginId().notice: Returns the ID of the current plugin instance

setPluginId(uint256).notice: Sets the plugin ID of the plugin

@notice A modifier that checks if the caller is a module installed in the DAO
 @dev The function must use `_` before the require statement to execute the function body before checking the require condition

@title SimplePlugin
